question: What is your return policy?
answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all items in original condition with tags attached. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days to the original payment method. Sale items may have different return conditions.

question: How do I return an item?
answer: To return an item: 1) Log into your account and go to Order History, 2) Select the item(s) to return, 3) Print the return label, 4) Package the item securely with original tags, 5) Drop at any authorized shipping location. Returns are free for US customers.

question: What are your shipping options and costs?
answer: We offer: Standard Shipping (5-7 business days, $5.99), Express Shipping (2-3 business days, $12.99), and Overnight Shipping ($24.99). Free standard shipping on orders over $50.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Processing time is 1-2 business days. Shipping times: Standard 5-7 days, Express 2-3 days, Overnight 1 day. International shipping takes 10-14 business days plus customs processing.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries. International shipping costs vary by destination and package weight. Customs fees and import taxes are the responsibility of the customer. Delivery typically takes 10-14 business days.

question: What is your warranty policy?
answer: Electronics come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty. Clothing and home goods have a 90-day quality guarantee. Warranty claims require proof of purchase and photos of the issue. Contact support within the warranty period.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay. All payments are processed securely through encrypted channels.

question: Is my payment information secure?
answer: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption and never store your complete payment details. We are PCI DSS compliant and regularly undergo security audits.

question: What is your privacy policy?
answer: We collect only necessary information to process orders and improve your experience. We never sell your data to third parties. You can request data deletion at any time by contacting privacy@techshop.com.

question: Do you price match?
answer: Yes, we offer price matching within 14 days of purchase. The item must be identical and in stock at an authorized retailer. Contact support with the competitor's current price and we'll process the difference.

question: How do I track my order?
answer: You can track your order by: 1) Logging into your account and viewing Order History, 2) Using the tracking link in your shipping confirmation email, or 3) Contacting our support team with your order number.

question: What if my order is damaged or incorrect?
answer: If you receive damaged or incorrect items, contact us within 48 hours of delivery. Provide photos of the issue and we'll arrange a free return and replacement or refund. We cover all return shipping costs for damaged/incorrect items.

question: Do you have a loyalty program?
answer: Yes! Our TechShop Rewards program gives you 1 point per dollar spent. 100 points = $5 reward. You also get early access to sales, birthday discounts, and exclusive member-only products.

question: What are your customer support hours?
answer: Our support team is available Monday-Friday 9AM-9PM EST and Saturday-Sunday 10AM-6PM EST. You can reach us by chat, email at support@techshop.com, or phone at 1-800-TECHSHOP.
